Author: jl777c#5810

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: the team has been working triple overtime in recent weeks and needs a well deserved break, thanks

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: there are several advantages to be taddr only for KMD, and with some clever tech we can have our cake and eat it too. I am still working on parts of this so even if the marketing was 100% ready, some significant details can change. I figured with 0.1% of actual usage it isnt really that significant of a deal to have to rush things out immediately. all the sprout funds are safe. there will be a way to do private tx.

Author: MaJoRa#0131
Content:
hey guys - looking for some information from anyone who uses coinbase and hoping someone can help out. I signed up earlier today, and for the first time ever, I'm getting spam into my inbox. In fact, I started receiving said spam only 2 hours after signing up, and a fair bit of it.

I didn't sign up with a specialised email address because I was under the impression coinbase were trustworthy - this means I can't prove 100% that it was signing up to them that caused the influx in spam. But my concern is that my email has been leaked or shared with third parties. 

I haven't given them any card information yet - but obviously this is rather concerning considering what coinbase is supposed to be for. Can anyone speak to their trustworthyness?
